mechanics.condition: Caster targets a solid surface within 120 feet
mechanics.outcome: Create an opaque wall of fire for 1 minute (60ft L x 20ft H x 1ft T OR ringed 20ft D x 20ft H x 1ft T)

mechanics.condition: Creature is within the wall's area
mechanics.outcome: Creature makes a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, takes 5d8 fire damage. On a successful save, takes half 5d8 fire damage.

mechanics.condition: Creature on the damaging side of the wall enters the wall for the first time this turn
Creature on the damaging side of the wall is within 10 feet of that side OR inside the wall
Creature is on the non-damaging side of the wall or interacts with it from that side
mechanics.outcome: That side of the wall deals no damage

description_text: You create a wall of fire on a solid surface within range. You can make the wall up to 60 feet long, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick, or a ringed wall up to 20 feet in diameter, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick. The wall is opaque and lasts for the duration.When the wall appears, each creature within its area must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 5d8 fire damage, or half as much damage on a successful save.One side of the wall, selected by you when you cast this spell, deals 5d8 fire damage to each creature that ends its turn within 10 feet o f that side or inside the wall. A creature takes the same damage when it enters the wall for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there. The other side of the wall deals no damage.The other side of the wall deals no damage.
